Appearance
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

This article contains a list of all matches played during the 2025 Super Rugby Pacific regular season. The draw for the 30th season of Super Rugby was announced on 30 September 2024.[1] A few weeks earlier, it had been revealed that in 2025 the regular season would be extended to sixteen rounds during which each team would play fourteen games and have two byes. It was also announced that the 2025 season would feature family-friendly afternoon fixtures (including three Sunday afternoon games) and would start one week earlier than previous seasons, on Friday 14 February 2025, to fit in the extra week of round-robin games.[2] The 2025 season would again feature a "Culture Round", "Kids Round" and an "ANZAC Weekend Round".[1][3] However, the 2025 season wouldn't include a "Super Round" (a round during the season that is hosted by one single venue; played in Melbourne since its introduction in 2022), although SANZAAR was examining options for its return the next season.[4][5]

See also

[edit]
  • 2025 Super Rugby Pacific season

Notes

[edit]
  1. ^ The venue for the round 2 match between the Hurricanes and the Drua on 22 February 2025 wasn't yet known at the time the schedule for the 2025 Super Rugby Pacific season was released. On 30 October 2024, the Hurricanes announced that the game would be played at McLean Park in Napier.[11]
  2. ^ The round 6 match between Moana Pasifika and the Chiefs on 21 March 2025 was originally scheduled to be played at Teufaiva Stadium, Nuku'alofa, but the game had to be moved to another venue for logistical reasons.[21]
  3. ^ The venue for the round 7 match between the Hurricanes and the Waratahs on 28 March 2025 wasn't yet known at the time the schedule for the 2025 Super Rugby Pacific season was released. Without further announcement, the game was later scheduled as being played at Sky Stadium, Wellington on the official Super Rugby websites.[25][26]
  4. ^ The fixture between the Drua and the Waratahs was originally due to start at 15:35, but was moved to a 14:05 kick-off.[33]
  5. ^ The venue for the round 10 match between Moana Pasifika and the Brumbies on 19 April 2025 wasn't yet known at the time the schedule for the 2025 Super Rugby Pacific season was released. On 21 January 2025, Moana Pasifika confirmed that it would host the Brumbies at Navigation Homes Stadium in Pukekohe, making it the club's first match in South Auckland.[34]
  6. ^ The fixture between Moana Pasifika and the Brumbies was originally due to start at 14:05, but was moved to a 16:45 kick-off.[33]
  7. ^ The venue for the round 11 match between the Chiefs and the Force on 25 April 2025 wasn't yet known at the time the schedule for the 2025 Super Rugby Pacific season was released. On 15 January 2025, the Chiefs revealed the Bay Oval in Mount Maunganui as the venue for the game.[37]
